articles.title: Even Drake Maye’s dad is surprised by Patriots’ Super Bowl run
articles.description:
"That’s pretty tough to do.”

The post Even Drake Maye’s dad is surprised by Patriots’ Super Bowl run appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' unexpected Super Bowl run surprises even Drake Maye's father.
The team has advanced to Super Bowl LX, highlighting their resilience this season.
Boston fans are rallying around the team, boosting local morale and community spirit.

articles.title: That guy on TV, Cris Collinsworth, will look familiar to Patriots fans tuning into NBC to watch the Super Bowl
articles.description:
Collinsworth has broadcasted five Super Bowls involving the Patriots, including their previous matchup with the Seahawks 11 seasons ago.

The post That guy on TV, Cris Collinsworth, will look familiar to Patriots fans tuning into NBC to watch the Super Bowl appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cris Collinsworth will broadcast the Super Bowl on NBC for Boston Patriots fans.
He has covered five Super Bowls involving the Patriots, including the Seahawks in 2015.
Local viewers can expect familiar commentary from Collinsworth during the game.

articles.title: Mass. snowplow driver who spotted legs sticking out of snowbank praised for saving older man
articles.description:
A quick response during a snowstorm is credited with saving a man’s life in Auburn.

The post Mass. snowplow driver who spotted legs sticking out of snowbank praised for saving older man appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Snowplow driver spotted legs in a snowbank, saving an older man's life during a storm.
The incident occurred in Auburn, Massachusetts, highlighting the importance of quick responses.
Local residents are reminded of the dangers of heavy snowfall and the need for vigilance.
